    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4438</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Science, Technology and Society on the Internet</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencias, Tecnología y Sociedad en Internet</string>
            <string language="ga">Eolaíocht, Teicneolaíocht agus an Sochaí ar an Idirlíon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft, Technologie und Gesellschaft auf 
dem Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science, technologie et société sur 
l'Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência, tecnologia e sociedade no Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza, tecnologia e società sul Internet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη, τεχνολογία και κοινωνία στο διαδίκτυο</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A model for teaching STS to Transition Year using the Internet as the source of information.</string>
            <string language="es">Un modelo para enseñar Ciencia y Tecnología (STS, Science and Technology Studies) en el año de Transición utilizando Internet como fuente de información.</string>
            <string language="ga">Sampla don STS a mhúineadh don Idirbhliain agus an t-idirlíon á úsáid mar fhoinse eolais.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Transition Year</string>
            <string language="es">Año de Transición</string>
            <string language="ga">An Idirbhliain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Additional Resource</string>
            <string language="es">Recurso adicional</string>
            <string language="ga">Acmhainn Bhreise</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Modell für das Unterrichten von von 
Überziehschutzanlage zum Übergang Jahr mit dem Internet als die 
Quelle der Informationen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un modèle pour enseigner le STS à l'année de 
transition en utilisant l'Internet comme source d'information.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um modelo para ensinar o STS ao ano da 
transição usando o Internet como a fonte da informação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un modello per l'istruzione dello STS all'anno di
transizione usando il Internet come la sorgente delle informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα μοντέλο για τη διδασκαλία STS στο έτος 
μετάβασης που χρησιμοποιεί το Διαδίκτυο ως πηγή πληροφοριών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übergang Jahr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusätzliches Hilfsmittel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Année de Transition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource Supplémentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ano Da Transição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso Adicional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Anno Di Transizione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόσθετο στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς</string>
          </keyword>
